page.title: 20A NOTABLE EVENT, SWANSEA
page.content: It isn't often that a school is visited by the two most important people in the county at the same time. This year the chairman of the school governors is Chairman of West Glamorgan County Council, while the Lord Mayor of Swansea lives close to the school. Both arrived at the school in lovely black cars. Their chains were very impressive and made them look very important. The County Chair- man's was made of steel because of the important steel works in the area. We soon learned that the two men led busy lives during their year in office. They explained that they represented all the people in the county. They must lead a very busy life indeed. All too soon the chauffeurs came to remind these busy men that it was time to go. A few quick goodbyes and two lovely black cars whisked away our visitors.
